install.name: Joomla! XML-RPC Upload for .xml files
install.author: Jakub Balhar
install.description: Joomla! XML-RPC for uploading XML files. Plugin exposes two methods one uploadXML.listFiles and uploadXML.uploadFile. Both services are restricted only two documents that are in *Sekce* and *Kategorie* parameters. If *XSD/XSL Path* is set, the uploadXML.uploadFile uploads the document only if it finds a validating schema in the designated folder. If there is an xslt transformation with the same name as the validating schema, it is applied to the document before it is saved to the database. Both services perform authentication and authorization. The *XSD/XSL Path* is relative to Joomla root, typical setting: 'xml/ws/'.
